column6:
At my place, you will enjoy the simple lifestyle for sure! 

Besides the coziness, we are offering a little more to make your stay even more comfortable:
** Free drink: bottle water, hot tea, Coffee(Nespresso).
** AWESOME media entertainment: Great wireless speakers, Apple TV, Chromecast.
** Warm welcome from host!

Close to Supermarkets(Walmart, Target, Tom thumb), Starbucks, restaurants, UTD, hiking parks, highways to downtown and airport. Good for solo adventurers, and business travelers.
